## Parametric Plots

Plot function pair (x(u), y(u)). 
See @fig-parametric for an example.

```{julia}
#| label: fig-parametric
#| fig-cap: "Parametric Plots"

using Plots

plot(sin, 
     x->sin(2x), 
     0, 
     2Ï€, 
     leg=false, 
     fill=(0,:lavender))
```

```{julia}
#| label: fig-plots
#| fig-cap: "Multiple Plots"
#| fig-subcap:
#|   - "Plot 1"
#|   - "Plot 2"
#| layout-ncol: 2

using Plots
display(plot(sin, x -> sin(2x), 0, 2))
display(plot(x -> sin(4x), y -> sin(5y), 0, 2))
```
